title: Q3 Combine Sentences MC
prompt: What is the <u>best</u> way to combine the sentences?
description:
Read these sentences.

They waited for the bus. Conor listened to music. Sam sent text messages to friends.
feedback: The correct answer is “While they waited for the bus, Conor listened to music, and Sam sent text messages to friends.” The three short sentences can be combined into a complex sentence including a subordinate clause (“While they waited for the bus”) and two independent clauses separated by a comma and the word “and.” The other options either use incorrect punctuation or grammar or change the meaning of the sentences.
